page.title: 14ECONOMICS - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer has{four banks}and{eight {building society offices.}All four banks are Scottish based. They are:- The Royal Bank of Scotland. The Bank of Scotland. The Clydesdale Bank. The Trustees Saving Bank. Banking can also take place through the Post Office - National Giro Bank. Several of the building societies have their own offices, the rest share their premises with other firms such as lawyers. They are:- Abbey National Building Society. Alliance Building Society. Bradford and Bingley Building Society Dalbeattie Finance. Halifax Building Society. Leicester Building Society. Nationwide Building Society. Woolwich Equitable Building Society.
